tool.name: qiime emperor procrustes-plot
tool.description: - Visualize and Interact with a procrustes plot
tool.command:
qiime emperor procrustes-plot --i-reference-pcoa=$ireferencepcoa
#def list_dict_to_string(list_dict): #set $file_list = list_dict[0]['additional_input'].__getattr__('file_name') #for d in list_dict[1:]: #set $file_list = $file_list + ',' + d['additional_input'].__getattr__('file_name') #end for #return $file_list #end def
--m-metadata-file=$list_dict_to_string($input_files_mmetadatafile) --i-other-pcoa=$iotherpcoa
#if str($pcustomaxes): --p-custom-axes="$pcustomaxes" #end if
#if str($cmdconfig) != 'None': --cmd-config=$cmdconfig #end if
--o-visualization=ovisualization;
qiime tools export --input-path ovisualization.qzv --output-path out && mkdir -p '$ovisualization.files_path' && cp -r out/* '$ovisualization.files_path' && mv '$ovisualization.files_path/index.html' '$ovisualization';

param.label: --i-reference-pcoa: PCoAResults The reference ordination matrix to be plotted. [required]
param.name: ireferencepcoa

param.label: --i-other-pcoa: PCoAResults The 'other' ordination matrix to be plotted (the one that was fitted to the reference). [required]
param.name: iotherpcoa

param.label: --m-metadata-file: Metadata file or artifact viewable as metadata. This option may be supplied multiple times to merge metadata. The sample metadata. [required]
param.name: additional_input

param.label: --p-custom-axes: Numeric sample metadata columns that should be included as axes in the Emperor plot. [optional]
param.name: pcustomaxes

param.label: --cmd-config: Use config file for command options
param.name: cmdconfig

tool.help:
Visualize and Interact with a procrustes plot ----------------------------------------------
Plot two procrustes-fitted matrices
Parameters ---------- reference_pcoa : PCoAResults The reference ordination matrix to be plotted. other_pcoa : PCoAResults The "other" ordination matrix to be plotted (the one that was fitted to the reference). metadata : Metadata The sample metadata. custom_axes : List[Str], optional Numeric sample metadata columns that should be included as axes in the Emperor plot.
Returns ------- visualization : Visualization \
